php.LBL_ASSIGN_EXISTING_PRIVILEGES: اختصاص قوانین دسترسی از یک پروفایل خاص
php.LBL_USERS_WITH_SAME_OR_LOWER_LEVEL: کاربران نقش زیردست یا همرده داشته باشند
php.LBL_USERS_LIST: لیست کاربران متعلق به این نقش:
php.LBL_POSSIBLE_CHANGE_OWNER_OF_RECORD: Enable change of the record owner
php.LBL_SEARCH_WITHOUT_PERMISSION: Modules that can be searched without permission
php.LBL_BROWSING_OTHER_USERS_GRAPHICAL_CALEN: Whether or not browsing other users' graphical calendars is possible
php.LBL_CLENDAR_ALLO_RECORDS_2: I can only see myself and groups
php.LBL_CLENDAR_ALLO_RECORDS_3: I can see the users who result from the record list I can access
php.LBL_PERMISSIONS_TO_LIST_RELATED_RECORDS: Should the list of records, related to the records we can access, be shared
php.LBL_PERMISSIONS_TO_VIEW_RELATED_RECORDS: Should the preview of records, related to the records we can access, be shared
php.LBL_PERMISSIONS_TO_EDIT_RELATED_RECORDS: Should the edition of records (that we do not own), related to our records, be enabled
php.LBL_PERMISSIONS_FIELD_RELATED_RECORDS: Permissions for the related records are field-based
